articles.description: England qualify for the T20 World Cup Super 8s after Australia battle past an excellent Scotland side in St Lucia.
articles.title: T20 World Cup 2024: England make Super 8s after Australia beat Scotland

articles.description: The 2020 US Open champion Bryson DeChambeau takes a three-shot lead over Rory McIlroy and Patrick Cantlay into Sunday's final round.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Bryson DeChambeau leads Rory McIlroy and Patrick Cantlay by three

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Italy vs Albania in the UEFA Euro 2024
articles.title: Italy vs Albania: UEFA Euro 2024 - BBC Sport

articles.description: England beat the rain and Namibia to keep their T20 World Cup defence alive but are still reliant on Australia beating Scotland.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: England beat rain and Namibia to keep hopes alive

articles.description: Tributes from the world of football to Kevin Campbell show he was a hugely popular amazing character, England boss Gareth Southgate says.
articles.title: Kevin Campbell tributes show he was 'amazing character' - England boss Gareth Southgate

articles.description: Spanish football expert Guillem Balague looks at Lamine Yamal's rise to becoming the youngest player in European Championship history.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Lamine Yamal makes history for Spain against Croatia

articles.description: Briton Chris Billam-Smith retained his WBO cruiserweight title with a dominant points win over compatriot Richard Riakporhe at Selhurst Park.
articles.title: Chris Billam-Smith vs Richard Riakporhe: Bournemouth man retains world title in dominant points win

articles.description: Conor McGregor says the decision to pull out of his comeback fight against Michael Chandler "not made lightly".
articles.title: UFC 303: Conor McGregor says decision to pull out of Michael Chandler fight 'not made lightly'

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Serbia vs England in the UEFA Euro 2024
articles.title: Serbia vs England: UEFA Euro 2024 - BBC Sport

articles.description: Millwall goalkeeper Matija Sarkic dies at the age of 26, the club announce.
articles.title: Matija Sarkic: Millwall announce death of goalkeeper aged 26
